item.title: DC Motors 101
item.description: Watch the video mini-lecture on DC motor control from Dr.Â Jordan What types of DC motors are most common?

item.title: Power Supplies 101
item.description: What are the components of a basic power supply subsystem? Source of power - battery, AC adapter, solar Input electronic noise filtering circuit Voltage regulator to provide a constant supply voltage Output electronic noise filtering circuit What are the design considerations for a battery-operated circuit?

item.title: Strategies for using 0 Ohm Resistors
item.description: Why use 0 ohm Resistors in a design? 0 ohm resistors act as a through hole jumper wire on manufactured PCBs.
